subject: Steroids
Government Bonds
Decisions and Verdicts
News and News Media
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds submitted court papers complaining that his chances for a fair trial could be hurt by typographical errors in a government filing wrongly accusing him of flunking a drug test in 2001.
